PICTURE QUALITY

Cinematic
picture
quality from the
comfort of
home

An aircraft is flying over a city full of skyscrapers at night. The video fades to show many bright Mini LEDs arranged next to eachother. The image then fades to show the aircraft flying over the city again.

The finest details powered by Quantum Matrix Technology Pro draw you deep into the action. The Neural Quantum Processor 8K also uses AI to boost the contrast level, so everything you watch intensifies before your very eyes.

transported to

An orchestra is playing music. Then, the video zooms out to show the entire orchestra as well as the conductor on the Neo QLED. Sound waves are coming out of the Soundbar as well as from the back of the TV.

Immerse yourself in the surround sound of a live orchestra straight from your living room with the latest Dolby Atmos and
Q-symphony that take your at-home experience to new heights.

Design

DESIGN

A touch of
splendor to enrich
your
space

A side of the Neo QLED is displayed, then turned 90 degrees to show its screen. The video then changes to show a TV with black bezels. A light flashes through the bezels to eliminate it, leaving a TV with nearly invisible bezels.

The upper half of the Neo QLED is displayed on a white background. The Neo QLED has wave-like blue graphics on its screen.

Elevate your home with the Infinity One Design. With black edges having all but disappeared on the Infinity Screen, your Neo QLED has the sleek simplicity to create absolute beauty.

Samsung Neo QLED

Neo QLED
Compare

  • Category

  • Screen Size

  • Resolution

  • Quantum Matrix Technology Quantum Matrix Technology is a proprietary technology of Samsung Neo QLED based on Quantum Mini LED. It allows a massive reduction in pictureblooming and detail-boosted deep blacks through ultrafine light control.

  • Processor

  • Dolby Atmos Dolby Atmos goes beyond the ordinary listening experience and puts you inside the sound in a new spatial way. Combining with upfiring speakers, you can fully enjoy the immersive, cinematic sound of Dolby Atmos.

  • OTS OTS stands for 'Object Tracking Sound', Samsungs proprietary highperformance audio technology that enables users to hear sound directly from its object's relative location on the screen, even if the object is moving.

  • Design

  • Smart TV

  • Gaming motion Gaming Motion is a technology that provides smooth motion and clean image quality without blur even in fastpaced game content.
